title: Italianissimo 1: beginners. Eps 1-5
brief_description: An italian multimedia language programe which develops the student’s understanding of the grammar and idioms of italian, as well as showing the countryside and customs of Italy. This tape comprises 5 episodes entitled “Immagini” which deals with italian sounds and simple expressions; “In famiglia e fra amici” which deals with making simple enquiries and formal and informal language; “In tempo libero” looks at how to relate information about oneself; “I pendolari” deals with time, jobs and work; and “Vivere in citta” looks at shopping. Family life, sports and hobbies, dialects and the city of Bologna are featured in these episodes. Teacher and student texts and a series of audio-cassettes are available and can be borrowed as separate loan items.
